title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog displays obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes (e.g., a, a1, b, c, d) prominently appear in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be either sorted after class names that start with a capital letter or completely filtered out.
SR: I suggest option (a) to sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
